mapper.sql: id, apply_detail_id, material_type_id, location_wbs, location_name, pallet_id, amount, ebs_wh_code, ebs_wh_child_code, trade_no, price
mapper.select: select t.*, t1.name as palletName from bu_material_assign_detail t left join bu_material_pallet t1 on t1.id = t.pallet_id where t.apply_detail_id = #{applyDetailId} order by t.material_type_id, t.ebs_wh_code, t.ebs_wh_child_code, t.location_wbs

select t.*, t1.name as palletName from bu_material_assign_detail t left join bu_material_pallet t1 on t1.id = t.pallet_id where t.apply_detail_id
in
#{applyDetailId}
= '-1'
order by t.material_type_id, t.ebs_wh_code, t.ebs_wh_child_code, t.location_wbs

select t.*, t1.name as palletName, t4.id as orderId, t4.order_code from bu_material_assign_detail t left join bu_material_pallet t1 on t1.id = t.pallet_id left join bu_material_apply_detail t2 on t2.id = t.apply_detail_id left join bu_material_apply t3 on t3.id = t2.apply_id left join bu_work_order t4 on t4.id = t3.work_order_id where t.id
in
#{id}
= '-1'
order by t.material_type_id, t.ebs_wh_code, t.ebs_wh_child_code, t.location_wbs

SELECT t.*, t8.code as locationCode, t8.sys_house_category as sysHouseCategory, t1.use_category, t3.train_no, t3.order_code, t5.code as materialCode, t5.name as materialName, t5.spec as materialSpec, IFNULL(t1.unit_price, 0) as materialUnitPrice, t1.confirm_time, t3.line_id, t7.depot_id, t4.id AS workshopId, t4.name as workshopName, t6.id AS trainid, t7.repair_program_id AS programId, t3.fd_project, t9.code as fdProjectCode, t9.name as fdProjectName, t3.fd_task, t10.code as fdTaskCode, t10.name as fdTaskName, t3.fd_cost_type FROM bu_material_assign_detail t left join bu_material_apply_detail t1 on t1.id = t.apply_detail_id left join bu_material_apply t2 on t2.id = t1.apply_id LEFT JOIN bu_work_order t3 ON t3.id = t2.work_order_id LEFT JOIN bu_mtr_workshop t4 ON t4.id = t3.workshop_id LEFT JOIN bu_material_type t5 ON t5.id = t.material_type_id LEFT JOIN bu_train_info t6 on t6.train_no = t3.train_no LEFT JOIN bu_repair_plan t7 on t7.id = t3.plan_id LEFT JOIN bu_mtr_warehouse t8 on t8.wbs = t.location_wbs LEFT JOIN bu_maximo_finance_item t9 on t9.id = t3.fd_project LEFT JOIN bu_maximo_finance_item t10 on t10.id = t3.fd_task where t.id
in
#{id}
= '-1'

select t.pallet_id from bu_material_assign_detail t left join bu_material_apply_detail t1 on t1.id = t.apply_detail_id left join bu_material_apply t2 on t2.id = t1.apply_id left join bu_work_order t3 on t3.id = t2.work_order_id where t3.order_status not in (3, 4)

select t.*, t1.apply_id from bu_material_assign_detail t left join bu_material_apply_detail t1 on t1.id = t.apply_detail_id left join bu_material_apply t2 on t2.id = t1.apply_id where t2.work_order_id = #{orderId}

select t.*, t1.apply_id from bu_material_assign_detail t left join bu_material_apply_detail t1 on t1.id = t.apply_detail_id left join bu_material_apply t2 on t2.id = t1.apply_id where t2.work_order_id in
#{orderId}

select t.*, t3.train_no, t3.order_code as sourceOrderCode from bu_material_assign_detail t left join bu_material_apply_detail t1 on t1.id = t.apply_detail_id left join bu_work_order_material t2 on t2.id = t1.order_material_id left join bu_work_order t3 on t3.id = t2.order_id where t1.status = 2 and t1.order_material_id
in
#{orderMaterialId}
= '-1'
